text: Sandro Kulenović (born 4 December 1999) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays for Rijeka, on loan from Dinamo Zagreb, as a striker. ==Club career== Born in Zagreb, Kulenović joined the academy of Dinamo Zagreb in 2008. During the 2015–16 season, he played 27 times for the reserves, scoring 22 goals and adding 11 assists. On 7 June 2016, he moved abroad and joined the academy of Polish club Legia Warsaw on a three-year contract. On 22 July 2017, he was loaned out to the youth team of Italian club Juventus, but returned to his parent club in the following June. On 10 July 2018, Kulenović made his first team debut, playing the last nine minutes of a 1–0 victory over Irish club Cork City in the UEFA Champions League. On 22 August, he signed a three- year contract extension with the club. On 27 October, he scored his first goal for the club in a 1–1 league draw against Jagiellonia Białystok. ==International career== Kulenović has been capped at the youth international level and also captained the Croatia under-16 team. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Legia Warsaw |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Ekstraklasa |21||4||3||0||1||0||25||4 |- |2019–20 |3||1||0||0||8||1||11||2 |- !colspan="2"|Total !24!!5!!3!!0!!9!!1!!36!!6 |- |rowspan="3"|Dinamo Zagreb |2019–20 |rowspan="2"|Prva HNL |16||0||0||0||0||0||16||0 |- |2020–21 |2||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !18!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!18!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !42!!5!!3!!0!!9!!1!!54!!6 |} ==Style of play== Kulenović plays as a typical number 9. Croatian journalists have often hailed him as "the new Mandžukić". ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:People from Zagreb Category:Croatian footballers Category:Legia Warsaw players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:GNK Dinamo Zagreb players Category:HNK Rijeka players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:Croatia youth international footballers Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Poland
title: Sandro Kulenović
